custom_params.label: SAW
custom_params.tooltip: Position in sine→saw wavetable set (26-point hardware telemetry)

custom_params.label: SQR
custom_params.tooltip: Position in sine→square wavetable set (26-point hardware telemetry)

custom_params.label: MIX
custom_params.tooltip: Crossfade between SAW (0) and SQR (1) wavetable tracks
